project_name.justification: The primary asset of 087 is the Bishop Gold Mill.

company_name.justification: North Bay Resources Inc. (the “Company” or “North Bay”) (OTC: NBRI) is pleased to announce it has entered into a share purchase agreement to acquire an additional 14.5% of the Bishop Gold Mill...

ceo_buyer.justification: On behalf of the Board of Directors of NORTH BAY RESOURCES INC. Jared Lazerson CEO

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction brings North Bay's total ownership to 70%. The text states: '...to acquire an additional 14.5% of the Bishop Gold Mill (the “Mill”), bringing total ownership to 70%.' and 'Within this transaction, North Bay acquires a total interest of 70% of 087...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is a gold mill and the text mentions the installation of gold extraction equipment. 'The Company has recently acquired and installed additional gold extraction equipment including centrifuge in a gravity primary position... based on a December 2024 metallurgical study... showing a 97% recovery of gold...'

verified_article_link.justification: No verifiable article link was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The second article specifies the currency for cash payments: '(*all cash payments are in USD)'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of scheduled payments: $12,500 + $12,500 + $12,500 + $50,000 + $25,000 + $50,000 = $162,500. The text lists these as: '$12,500 payable on signing', '$12,500 payable on February 15, 2025', '$12,500 payable on April 1, 2025', '$50,000 payable on July 7, 2025', '$25,000 payable August 15, 2025', '$50,000 payable September 25, 2025'.

share_payments_raw.justification: The share payment is valued at $200,000 CAD, which is converted to USD using the provided exchange rate of 0.70 ($200,000 * 0.70 = $140,000 USD). Text: '$200,000 CAD in common shares of North Bay to be delivered on signing at a foreign exchange rate CAD/USD of $0.70...'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Separate cash and share payment values are provided, so this combined field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Share Payments: ...$200,000 CAD in common shares of North Bay to be delivered on signing at a foreign exchange rate CAD/USD of $0.70 and share price of $0.0009 totaling 155,555,556 Restricted Shares...

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrant payments were mentioned in the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No option payments were mentioned in the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: Share Payments: ...$200,000 CAD in common shares of North Bay to be delivered on signing at a foreign exchange rate CAD/USD of $0.70 and share price of $0.0009...

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the text.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No exploration commitment value was mentioned in the text.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) was mentioned as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: No coverage area was mentioned for the Bishop Gold Mill.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area was mentioned for the Bishop Gold Mill.

resource_size.justification: The text mentions a resource ('head grade of 0,9 ounces per ton'), but this is explicitly for the 'Fran Gold Project', not the Bishop Gold Mill which is the project of interest.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is North Bay Resources Inc. The first document states '(OTC: NBRI)' and its detailed quote section specifies 'Exchange: OTCPK'.
